Package it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AtomEffectContext
    Atoms implementing this iterface may be used as an EffectContext aware of thier caller and all other information necessary to an effect's resolution
    AtomicAction
    Building block of Action, combinable with others in a complete Action
    AtomsContainer
    Exposes the functionality that an atom may require to its container.
    AtomsRunSequence
    Execution sequence made up of AtomicActions
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomBase
    Base implementation of AtomicAction.
    AtomContext
    An atom which allows the Interactions contained to use an EffectContext
    AtomsRunSequenceImpl
    A simple implementation of AtomsRunSequence based on a variation on Finite-State Automata
    GrabAtom
    Atom representing a GRAB atomic action
    GrabAtomTest
    Integration tests for GrabAtom These tests are run as a simulation of a complete game with controlled user inputs and cards drawn
    MoveAtom
    Atom representing a MOVE action of any radius
    MoveAtomTest
    Integration tests for MoveAtom These tests are run as a simulation of a complete game with controlled user inputs and cards drawn
    PowerUpAtom
    Atom representing an atomic action of using one or more powerups.
    ReloadAtom
    Atom representing an atomic RELOAD action
    ReloadAtomTest
    Integration tests for ReloadAtom These tests are run as a simulation of a complete game with controlled user inputs and cards drawn
    RevengeAtom
    Atom representing an atomic REVENGE action.
    ShootAtom
    Atom representing an atomic SHOOT action
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AtomicActionType
    Atomic action types.
